description: Marks an entity currently receiving anal penetration, signaling that other conflicting asshole/genital actions are unavailable.

fucking_entity_id.description: The ID of the entity performing anal penetration

consented.description: Whether this entity consents to continue receiving anal penetration

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component, {target} for the entity referenced by targetRole property

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID. Defaults to 'fucking_entity_id' for the entity performing anal penetration.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. High priority (80) for passive sexual act, same as receiving oral sex.
